Straight Shot makes the jump from the fallen trees, over to Nightshift, lan=
ding on his roof on two feet.  Elita needed extra protection now and Nights=
hift was forced to remain in alt form, seeing that it was the safest thing =
for her.  She looks to Scourge quickly and points in the direction of Tucso=
n's heading.

" SCOURGE,  SEND A GROUP OF SWEEPS BEHIND TUCSON!  HE MIGHT G=
ET AMBUSHED HIMSELF!  WE GOT ELITA SECURRED!"

Nightshift puts his window d=
own to allow Straight Shot inside in the passengers seat.

" Your dad isn't=
 himself and we don't know why.  But we'll do our best to save him.... Agai=
n."

Nightshift comments.

" Slag he better invest in some serious anti hac=
k'n software after this time."

Meanwhile Tucson continues the flight and s=
cans the ground.

" Noctorro, are we getting close to the Fuzors location?"=
